Name: FreeFly Burning
About the game: In this game you will navigate the flying spherical drone in different game modes, performing different missions and setting the new records. You will explode the fuel barrels, crush away everything on your way, fly over the reference points in the turbo-mode, burn down the vegetation, resist the enemies, drop the bombs and discover the new game modes. Dodge the enemiesâ€™ rockets, shoot sharp at the target and destroy everything on your way! Game features: Elaborate graphics with the possibility of its fine adjustment Various game modes Game location with wide variety of objects Dynamic battles
